statements: SELECT * FROM employee_performance;
SELECT employee_name, evaluation_score FROM employee_performance WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_performance ORDER BY evaluation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance WHERE employee_id BETWEEN 1001 AND 2000;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employee_performance WHERE evaluation_score > 4.0;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance ORDER BY employee_id DESC, employee_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(evaluation_score) AS avg_score, department FROM employee_performance GROUP BY department HAVING avg_score > 4.5;
SELECT employee_name, evaluation_score FROM employee_performance WHERE department = 'Finance' AND evaluation_score BETWEEN 3.5 AND 4.0 ORDER BY evaluation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance WHERE employee_name LIKE '%Ann%' OR employee_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY department ASC, evaluation_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department, evaluation_score FROM employee_performance ORDER BY evaluation_score ASC, department DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department='Sales';
SELECT metric_name, value FROM performance_metrics WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees JOIN performance_metrics ON employees.employee_id = performance_metrics.employee_id WHERE date_collected='2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC, employee_name ASC
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department IN ('IT', 'HR')
SELECT employee_name, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM employees JOIN performance_metrics ON employees.employee_id = performance_metrics.employee_id GROUP BY employee_name
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT employee_name, SUM(value) AS total_value FROM employees JOIN performance_metrics ON employees.employee_id = performance_metrics.employee_id GROUP BY employee_name ORDER BY total_value DESC
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT department_name FROM departments;
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews WHERE performance_score > 80 AND review_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, performance_score FROM employees INNER JOIN performance_reviews ON employees.employee_id = performance_reviews.employee_id WHERE performance_score > 85;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department = departments.department_name GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT employee_name, review_date, performance_score, reviewer FROM employees JOIN performance_reviews ON employees.employee_id = performance_reviews.employee_id WHERE reviewer = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT name, department FROM Employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT AVG(rating) FROM PerformanceReviews;
SELECT employee_id, goal_description, target_date FROM Goals WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT name, manager_id FROM Departments ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT name, department FROM Employees WHERE hire_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT review_id, rating, feedback FROM PerformanceReviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT name, department, hire_date FROM Employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT Goals.goal_id, Goals.goal_description, Employees.name FROM Goals INNER JOIN Employees ON Goals.employee_id = Employees.employee_id WHERE Goals.completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Employees ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, department FROM Employees WHERE department='Marketing';
SELECT review_date, rating, feedback FROM PerformanceReviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT department_name, manager_id FROM Departments INNER JOIN Managers ON Departments.manager_id = Managers.manager_id;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM BIReports ORDER BY report_name;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT first_name, last_name, hire_date FROM Employees WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, d.department_name FROM Employees e JOIN Departments d ON e.department = d.department_name;
SELECT p.employee_id, p.rating, pr.feedback FROM PerformanceReviews p JOIN PerformanceReviews pr ON p.review_id = pr.review_id WHERE p.rating > 3;
SELECT m.first_name AS manager_first_name, d.department_name AS manager_department FROM Managers m JOIN Departments d ON m.department_id = d.department_id;
